meaning: A usually green thin shape attached to a tree

example: Red leaves fell down to the grass.

meaning: What you get when you mix red and yellow together
example: Those leaves are a lovely shade of orange.

meaning: Heap; a group of the same thing piled on top of each other
example: We made a pile of leaves.

meaning: A tool you use for clearing leaves
example: We used the rake to rake up leaves.

meaning: A flexible container; a thing you use to hold something
example: We stored the leaves in a bag.
